name: Pipe-mare VR
description:
Pipemares is a game created for the TODO game jam

This is a Virtual Reality game that should work on an Oculus Quest (haven't tested it on other headsets)

For playing

  • Use the grip button to grab pipes
  • If using the left controller up or down to bring the pipe nearer or farther from you and right or left to rotate
  • When you place the pipe on one of the start or end pipes with the trigger you will place the pipe
  • Make a connection from start to end to win!

The assets used for creating the game are:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/highlight-plus-134...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/tube-constructor-kit...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/tad-sewer-kit-128...
